about_the_game:
This template is the first party GameCreator game template - 《Survivor》. It can be used to visualize the game of making Action Roguelike.

The template contains the functions of GameCreator engine and the core system unique to the template as well as the editor.

Joystick and SteamDeck support


Core Gameplay


Survive on the designated map and use automatic skills to kill incoming enemies.

Actor System


Multiple actors and their initial attributes and skills can be set for players to choose from.

● Support unlocking actors using coins.

● Support custom attributes and damage calculation formulas for actors.

● The actor's avatar can set collision range

● Support setting the maximum level and upgrade experience curve for actors

Enemy System


Multiple styles of enemies can be set

● Set the attributes and styles of enemy types in the database

● Place enemies on the level map, set their appearance timing, location, lifecycle, and other parameters

● The enemy's avatar can set collision range

Skill System


Skills provide a wide range of parameters to set, such as active and passive skills, cooldown time, damage values, etc

● Support shooting bullet screen skills, calculate damage based on the collision range of the bullet screen animation and the enemy's collision range

● Support direct skills, settle damage based on the collision range of the released animation and the enemy's collision range

● Supports locking targets or specifying angles

● Support passive skills and increase character attributes.

● Support related events (such as events when using skills, events when hitting targets)

● Support skill upgrading (e.g. through Hex Technology)

● More parameters waiting for you to experience

Hex Technology


After actor upgrading, you can select one from multiple Hex Technology.

It can create functions to acquire skills, upgrade skills, and customize events (such as clearing all enemies).

Supporting multiple parameters for upgrading skills, each Hicks can only upgrade one attribute, such as reducing skill cooldown time and increasing skill damage.

Global Talent


Global talents will not be reset by restarting the game, and will be strengthened by the coins earned each time the game is played.

● Support enhancing talents to bring new skills into the game

● Support enhancing the initial attributes of the character

● Support factions (as in game examples provide three factions)

● Support setting the upper limit of talent levels and dependency on talent trees

● Support custom events

Map Level


Multiple levels can be set

● Configure levels by drawing scenes and placing enemies

● Support setting multiple attributes for levels

● Support setting the required number of coins to unlock levels

● Does not support any obstacles

Advanced Extension


Due to the engine's support for plugins and scripts, and the template providing complete code and corresponding exclusive editors, it can be extended
arbitrarily on the basis of the template.

More features waiting for you to experience!

materials


The built-in materials in the template are allowed for commercial use.

If used for non GameCreator engines, it is necessary to purchase a professional version of GC software and indicate the source at .

It is not allowed to resell slightly modified versions of the material, but free sharing is allowed and must comply with this rule.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 X64
  • Processor: intel CORE i3-3200+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT750及以上
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 X64
  • Processor: intel CORE i5-4460+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX980及以上
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
